thag4.1:1.1: Adorned with jewelry and all dressed up,
thag4.1:1.2: with garlands, and sandalwood makeup piled on,
thag4.1:1.3: along the main street is a lady—
thag4.1:1.4: a dancer dancing as the music plays.
thag4.1:2.2: and while walking along I glanced at her,
thag4.1:2.3: adorned with jewelry and all dressed up,
thag4.1:2.4: like a snare of death laid down.
thag4.1:4.2: see the excellence of the teaching!
